bibl.title: "The Tomb of Alexander the Great". The History and the Legend in the Greco-Roman and Arab Times.
bibl.note: Analyse les sources grecques, latines et arabes, les récits des voyageurs, les rapports de fouilles. "But the mystery of the tomb of Alexander the Great remains."

bibl.title: Fourth International Congress on Graeco-Oriental and Graeco-African Studies

bibl.seg: TZALAS Harry E., "The Tomb of Alexander the Great". The History and the Legend in the Greco-Roman and Arab Times.
Fourth International Congress on Graeco-Oriental and Graeco-African Studies = Graeco-Arabica 5 (1993) pp. 329-354, 6 figg.
Analyse les sources grecques, latines et arabes, les récits des voyageurs, les rapports de fouilles. "But the mystery of the tomb of Alexander the Great remains."
